DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind , randomise , placebo-controlled , parallel group study two intervention arm . The study conduct 150 subject primary objective show fast LDL-cholesterol triglyceride lower effect plant sterols subject establish type 2 diabetes mellitus subject high risk develop type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Plant Sterols Blood Lipid Profile Subjects With High Risk Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: The main aim study investigate effect plant sterols fast triglyceride LDL-cholesterol concentration . This study also aim study effect plant sterols fast total cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol concentration Lipoprotein ( ) . Furthermore effect plant sterol fast blood glucose insulin explore . At last , sub-group , end intervention acute , chronic acute upon chronic effect plant sterols postprandial blood lipid , glucose insulin response mixed meal challenge rich fat carbohydrate explore .
